website_summaries.verdict: A great choice to fit female dog anatomy. They've helped many pet parents of older pooches get a full night's sleep.
pros: Customers love the fasteners, which are repositionable and fur resistant
Gathered leakproof edges keep urine inside the diaper
Designed to convert urine into gel on contact
Interior surface is soft and quilted
cons: Can be used for stool, but it may come out the tail hole
Some dogs are able to get the diapers off

customer_reviews.title: These diapers changed our lives!
customer_reviews.text: These diapers have changed our lives! Our 15 year old Yorkie would not stop peeing on the rugs. Now we just put diapers on her when we aren’t home. They fit perfectly and she doesn’t mind wearing them. She is almost 5 pounds and wears an XS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed for an elderly cat
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, I bought these for an elderly cat. I have a 20 year old cat who has become incontinent..that's the only thing wrong with him. In every other aspect he's completely normal, so I tried diapers to keep him comfortable and the house clean. He's not thrilled, but they stay on and they serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: annieb

customer_reviews.title: These ARE GREAT!!! Buy Them ! Try Them Out!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying simple solutions for six years for two of my Yorkshire terrier‘s when they changed their product I became frantic to find a comparable diaper that was lightweight -the tail hole was in the right spot and my dogs wouldn’t mind wearing I can’t tell you how thrilled I am to come upon these . They are comparable and maybe dare I say BETTER??? I have two YORKIES they are 8-11 pounds and they wear a Small Perfectly. They stay ON ( because the tail hole is in right place) and the fasteners can be refastened with no trouble. I will be purchasing these from now on. Hopefully they won’t change their product like simple solutions did.
customer_reviews.author: MARK ROSENBUSH

customer_reviews.title: Helping older dogs be better citizens :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for those helping your older small dog age gracefully. Ours is a 7lb (used to be 10lb) Yorkie who just won't quit :) The XS size fits her very well. We tried other made-for-dogs diapers (with a hole for the tail) that did not work nearly as well for "#2" as these do. It's tough(and messy) when you're old, but these diapers help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: bweaver

customer_reviews.title: Paw Inspired Ultra Protection Disposable...
customer_reviews.text: This diaper is better at absorbency and fit for my female dog. no leakage in the front like the other brand on Amazon. 12 lbs Norfolk Terrier is now leak free. And if she poops most often there isnt even a trace on the diaper. Straight out the hole ..
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Skip this company
customer_reviews.text: This company has no heart. Inordered 2 packages of diapers and used fewnout of 1 pkg. my dog passed away and they wsnt to charge me $8 to return a $8 product. Also no place to unsubscribe order. I dont need anymore as dont have a dog anymore and you dont allow that? Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These diapers work perfect for my chihuahua, Lily. Due to medication she can no longer control her bladder. These diapers contain the copious amount of urine she is excreting. They stay on well even though her stomach is swelling from the steriods. I have tried washable diapers and they are not nearly as absorbent. Lily is 11 pounds and the small fits her perfectly. One other delicate item to mention...she made it outside with out me seeing and by the time I noticed her she was having a bowel movement with her diaper on. They fit her so well that the tail hole does not cover her so you will not have to worry about those messes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My older beagle had to go on steroids for an infection and was drinking water like crazy which then causes frequent urination. During the day not a big deal, but at night she couldn’t go more than 2 hours without peeing. Desperate, I tried thes doggy diapers out and they worked great! They are easy to put on and the adjustable fit was perfect! To my surprise she doesn’t really mind them much at all (we only use them at night)! Not a bad price either! Note we only used them for urination, she did try to poop once then in and it cane through the hole where the tale goes...but for pee worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how expensive these are and so THIN. A while back I bought another brand off Amazon...Dono Jeans Super Absorbent Soft Pet Diapers. I put the two together. The Pet Soft Cotton Denim Jeans brand is thicker, wider, longer. The elastic at the waist is stronger and better in general. My little 17 year old Papillon is incontinent with urine when she sleeps. During the day we let her out every two hours and generally keep and eye on her if she wanders. So we use one diaper at night when we go to bed. I think these new diapers will not leak on us.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENCY with this product--NO QUALITY CONTROL!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got this package of doggie diapers it was perfect. The second time I got it the cotton in all the diapers was not lined up with the covering - they were all askew on an angle instead of straight. But the THIRD time I was REALLY disappointed because the diapers were almost a HALF INCH WIDER than the diapers in the previous packages and they are too wide to fit in my cloth diaper covers and way too wide to fit between the legs of my little Yorkie! There is obviously no quality control with this product. I do like the quilting and the good absorbency but who cares if they don't even fit.
customer_reviews.author: caprezia

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: I use these diapers on my 14 year old Shih Tzu who is experiencing incontinence. She is about 16 pounds and wears the small size. These diapers stay on really well compared to other brands we tried in the past. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KCO

customer_reviews.title: Extremely absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my 16 year old Shih Tzu who cannot always hold it! They are very absorbing and better quality than other brands we have ordered. For being XS, they are more like a S, so size up!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Great for an old dog with bladder problems
customer_reviews.text: Theses have been a great help with a 17 year old dog with dementia. She doesn’t realize she is doing anything wrong when she pees in the house. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Stays on great, but doesn't catch #2
customer_reviews.text: I love how these diapers stay on my cocker spaniel even when she tries to get out of them. The only drawback is they don't catch her poo. If she has an accident indoors, it comes through the hole that is cut out for her tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Deaux

customer_reviews.title: Leaky; tail hole too big
customer_reviews.text: Pros: They are very soft and quilted on the inside. Tabs stick to the diaper well. Cons: The tail hole is *huge,* particularly for a small-size diaper. The tail hole's size and location made it so my dog's anus wasn't covered by the diaper at all (dog is an 11-12 lb. Boston Terrier). Poop would easily fall out, though we didn't get that far to test it out - the diaper leaked a sizeable puddle of urine during my dog's first use of it. If your dog has a small tail, you might be better off using diapers designed for babies, which is what we'll be going back to.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle M. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: My dog is 16 years old. Up til this ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 16 years old. Up til this year, she had no bladder problems. Now, she's starting to make small accidents all over the place. This diaper works wonders. It fits her perfectly and she is unable to remove it herself. Doesn't leak, either. It's saving me from replacing my carpets or getting them cleaned constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Balloonsanddecor

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review from 4 stars to 5. I shouldn't knock the product if I was too dumb to look at the measurements. If you're using PetSmart size small, you should buy medium in these. "Doesn't seem to be as high quality as the ones I purchased at PetSmart." Quality is very good, and the elastic around the pad makes them better. PetSmart diapers have a cute "designer" pattern and a strip that tells you when they're wet. Big deal. I would buy these again, but doggie using them went back to its home.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad design and fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XS size for my 9lb miniature poodle mix, and even though they were the correct size for her, the position of the tail hole is so high on the diaper that it was impossible to get these to stay on her. I see that other reviewers have mentioned similar issues. Was hoping for a better result but will be returning these for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: mefranc

customer_reviews.title: Double check the small sizing for your dog or you might have a poop mess.
customer_reviews.text: These smalls don’t fit as well as other smalls from other brands. The tail hole doesn’t seem to line up well, and hangs a little loose, so when my 16-yr-old mini dachshund has a #2 accident, the poop gets all caught up in the diaper, on her, and the surrounding area. Other brands in size small that fit her much better, if she has a #2 accident, usually it misses the edges of the diaper and lands on the floor, which is way less of a mess to clean up. These accidents don’t happen super often, but once or twice is enough to make me not order these again. No complaints with urine absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t stay on, so a useless purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I measured my pet and ordered the appropriate size. Although they fit my pets waist, no matter how tight I fastened them, they would fall off her. I believe the diaper is not long enough. It fastens very low on her body near her tail. The sticky tabs on sides don’t refasten well. I ended up using masking tape to ensure a tight and permanent closure. Dog would basically walk right out of them. I really wanted them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont know if I would have been able to keep my geriatric beagle without these diapers. I adopted a senior old girl not knowing she wasn't housebroken and she's too old and sick to train at this point. These diapers are super absorbant and have never leaked...even when I've had unexpected 10 hour days when I can't get home to change her. They must be comfortable because she has never tried to remove them (though she does like to bork and make us run after her for diaper changes.) I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P

customer_reviews.title: Total Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old female Westie has kidney disease and a leaky bladder (age). These diapers are genius, well-engineered means no leaks. She is 21 lbs, fit nicely and they DID catch poop the time I let her out but forgot to remove them!!! I can't say enough good things about these diapers. Every claim on pkg is true.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are a Godsend. I use them sometimes during the day because I do let her out throughout the day. It depends on how much she goes in the house in between her visits outside. I do put them on her all of the time at night. My dog is diabetic and just had her 15th birthday, so she has urinary issues. The diaper holds a lot of urine. It turns to gel just like the description says. Plus, there is no urine odor. My dog's skin and her fur stay nice and dry with these diapers. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: barb54

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit, and falls right off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog that has doggy dementia. Shes a roly poly 16 yr old fat chihuahua (not the teacup size). We put these diapers on her, and they dont fit right! We tried to open the hole lower for her tail because the diaper hole was too high. The tabs didnt want to stay closed. Theyre like barely there velcro. So we taped the diaper shut. Which would have been ok if McGuyver-ing was enough. But nope! The diaper wouldnt stay up! Literally fell off within 2 mins. Save yourself the trouble (and money) and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Psalms

customer_reviews.title: The fit on these is strange
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini American Eskimo who is incontinent when she sleeps due to old age. The diapers stay on her because of her curled tail. The tail hole is huge for a size small! Maybe my dog is just built weird but once the diaper was on her and secure, the tail hole was so big that her poor little hoohaa was sticking out of it too! Totally defeats the purpose. The absorbent part starts a good inch below the tail hole so there was really no hope. I cut a hole farther down into the absorbent part but then the velcro strips wouldn't reach. I just don't think these were a good design.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect my dog is 12 and is losing weight in her waist but the rest of her is normal sized and no leaks all night. I tried different brands and this one was the best other companies fell of of her or had to be so tight then still didnt fit corrrctly. This product is a perfect fit . I will buy no more brands. Great for old dogs with Incontinence bladder infections and periods.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I have an average sized miniature schnauzer. I use these diapers for her incontinence. While they hold the pee well and don't leak....the problem is that they slide right off her when she's sleeping. They fit her well, so I don't think it's the size, there's just nothing that "clings" to her hair so I'll find a dry diaper on one side of the bed and a puddle on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Schweller78

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but the fit isn’t the best for small waisted dogs such as a French bulldog. The pampers kept sliding off of her butt but I bought some pajamas to secure it on her body. Once in place it does capture a lot of liquid. Also for frenchies with no tail it’s not a good idea for them to defecate in it. Since they have no tail and there is a tail hole the feces ooze out of the hole. I had to switch to actual baby pampers in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My female older dog suffers from incontinence, which involves night time accidents. I decided to give these doggie diapers a try. Unfortunately, they do NOT work because my dog can slip out of them. One shake and they fall off. In addition, they are very difficult to get on the dog and they make her look like a bow-legged cowboy when she tried to walk in them. She wasn’t happy in them, and I’m not happy because I spent $20 for them.
customer_reviews.author: SteelerFan

customer_reviews.title: Best diapars ever! Just wish they cost less!
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are the only ones that Ms Houdini does not dispose of somewhere along her travels. (Takes a watchful eye and plenty of reapplying to make the other doggy diapers do their duty.) I just wish these diapers came at a lower price. I have otherwise found the best ones for staying on are baby Huggies, a size larger than her weight would indicate. I have to cut holes for the tales with those however, which is, again, more work and time consuming.But they cost a lot less.....sigh
customer_reviews.author: Mary Twain

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We have a 13 year old dog that unfortunately has had some issues lately and we needed something for her when she slept. We tried two other brands first that were terrible. We are so glad we found this brand. They are so much better. No issues in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M Persin

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase for Price
customer_reviews.text: My older female pup has a hormonal incontinence problem. I put these on her at night because she will pee herself and not even notice. In the morning, she will wake up in such a panic because she's had an accident. So these diapers are perfect for her. If she has an accident, the diaper catches everything and my poor pup doesn't "suffer" the "embarrassment" of waking up to pee-covered bedding. I'm glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Toni O.

customer_reviews.title: If these fit correctly maybe I could tell how they really function
customer_reviews.text: I have bought washable diapers for my older 62 lb. Vizsla female, and I love them. Need disposables to send with her to the kennel for night time incontinence, read the reviews and decided to try these. Bought the Medium Plus. They do NOT fit her, even though her measurements fall within the labeled size. These are much too small and come right off her every single night. I measured them and although they claim to fit up to a 24” waist, that 24 inches includes the tape, which overlaps the fabric by necessity to secure them. I am getting Vets Choice and hope those work better for the kennel.
customer_reviews.author: DAJ54

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper
customer_reviews.text: We looked for diapers for both dogs and humans (our friends suggested cutting a tail hole in the regular baby diapers) and nothing worked well but these. These are great. They fit our dog well, she seems comfortable in them, and we can re-attach the sticky tabs at least once, maybe even twice, if we need to. Our dog's waist is 21" and she fits well into these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Federico

customer_reviews.title: I put them on a little differently and they work great
customer_reviews.text: At first like most people I had the problem that they didn’t stay on. They were too wide between my pups legs. I didn’t unfold the back part of the diaper and now they work perfectly. Don’t fall off and don’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: XS was too short
customer_reviews.text: I like the diapers themselves but not the sizing. For our 14 yr old small Boston Terrier, according to the measurements she should wear an XS. The XS was ok at her waist but the length was too short. I ordered the small and they’re the right size.
customer_reviews.author: vlt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My dog could very easily get out of these. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Who Woulda Thought
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as our little girl doggy has pee accidents during specific types of the day and someone suggested we try them. We found that having a diaper on her during these times keeps her from having an accident on the floor, or the accident is in the diaper. Very nice doggy diapers, holds a full doggy pee without leaking. Diapers are easy for one person to put on. Will be purchasing these again, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: No absorbency--no floor protection.
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old Pug is becoming incontinent. I regularly put out Pads to protect my wood floors (which have been damaged when she's peed on rugs without me knowing, or from Pads that have leaked through) I've moved her Pads into the bathroom which has a tile floor, but these Pads had no absorbency and the underside of each pad was wet after she used them. So I had to clean up after each use. I've since purchased another brand, and have not had this problem. Don't use if you're trying to protect your floors!!
customer_reviews.author: Sumcom

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok, but still falls off.
customer_reviews.text: As I said, The diaper fits ok, but the main problem, as with ALL the dog diapers I have tried, is they will eventually (within an hour or more) slide off when the dog moves around. The diapers I have used are exactly the same as children's except that they have a TAIL hole! Dog diapers need to come up further than the waist. No matter how tight I make them, well, I said it before they will be found around the dog's ankles! I will keep trying other brands.
customer_reviews.author: liverdancer

customer_reviews.title: Dog diaper
customer_reviews.text: good fit and the tabs can be removed and put back on again. My dog is sick, has diabetes and pees a lot. I wish all the dog diapers cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Bonbon5

customer_reviews.title: Good quality diaper/dependable :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12month old chihuahua about 8-10 lbs, on her 2nd heat. This is a good quality diaper and it fits her perfectly. My male chihuahua goes crazy over her scent and there’s no way for us to calm him down (even when we separate them in different rooms) but With the diaper on, he calms down a bit. We didn’t realize how the female menstrual scent can drive male dogs sooooo crazy (no exaggeration) since it’s the 1st time we’ve had male dogs. Planning on spaying and neutering them, but for now, this diaper is a HUGE help.
customer_reviews.author: BoothGeek

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: WHO gets excited about doggie diapers? WE DO!!! These fit perfectly and the TAPE is the BEST feature!! We take these off and on several times a day (and change out every morning). The tape LASTS and STICKS--but not to her fur!! This is a MIRACLE!!! Our little Bichon mix ("inherited" from my aging mother) doesn't always use the outside bathroom (both #1 AND #2). We keep these on her (plus an outer "cute panties"). While it's extra work to keep her diapered, it gives us PEACE of MIND and keeps her from messing in the house! (She does have residual wetness which these absorb nicely). LOVE this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my English Bulldog,
customer_reviews.text: These dog diapers do not stay on. I followed the directions for measurement, ordered the correct size from the measurement chart, but they slide off. They do not seem to position correctly on the dog, as the tail opening is too low and that actually provides less coverage as the pad is further underneath the dog and urine escapes out of the tail opening. Additionally, although the waist tabs fit snug on the dogs waist, the diaper still slides off her, when she shakes or moves a lot or even when laying in bed and moves around a bit. These are no better than human baby diapers and at 3 times the cost. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: BettySue

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the absorption these diapers have. Unlike the ones I was buying from Walmart these keep my dog dry and the pee turns into gelatin. It’s not just incontinence problem but at 13 years old and liver and bladder problems she pees a lot. I have a cockapoo with the size of a cocker spaniel and bought medium plus, although is a bit loose from the sides I like that they're larger for what my dogs pees.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just maybe problematic for a few types
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking everywhere for good "dog diaper" for my small (9lbs) dog who's becoming incontinent; thought I'd finally found it: unfortunately these won't stay on her for very long - however I think that's bc she's very short haired& lean: it's a good product that I think would work well for most dogs, esp furry ones. The tape is Really a nice feature bc you can undo/redo several times without problem + it does not seem to stick to dog hair, so the statements about product do all seem to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: H M.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous fit and function
customer_reviews.text: On July 4 I was given a neglected puppy. The vet thinks she's about a year old; she is malnourished and her nails were so long that she couldn't walk. Although I was told she was potty-trained, it ain't so. I ordered these diapers, and she has been good about training, but then she went into heat. Thank goodness I had these diapers! Their leak barrier protects my furnishings when she can't hold it. She can even poop on the potty pad with them on. Good adhesion and absorbency; great fit for a skinny, six-pound Silky.
customer_reviews.author: Caty Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sharpei who is small for her breed.I have tried just about every brand on the market. According to size charts , she wears a medium. None of them fit around waist or tail. I purchased large in these brands and still the diaper would fall off and never sit properly on her body especially around the tail. This brand was spot on and the perfect fit. I went with large despite the size chart but I am happy I did. Fits perfectly absorbs perfectly and now my life is easier and she is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel F. Montiel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these diapers for my 16 y/o dog who has been having issues with incontinence. They stayed on securely in place and would actually capture all of her urine if she had an accident in the house. I was buying diapers that were twice as expensive that always leaked if she had an accident. The diaper holds up well to taking on and off multiple times throughout the day as well. Its a great value for a product that actually works. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Must read...
customer_reviews.text: Our tiny Multipoo has had to wear diapers 24/7 for the past18 months. But she’s 17 years old!! These diapers are GREAT and have saved our sanity. Getting the right size is vital. We started out with x-small and changed after a while to xx-small as she lost weight. NOTE: diapers work perfectly collecting urine on girls but not their poo. It just drops to the ground ‘wherever’ it happens...so you’ll need to keep your dog confined (but not in a cage unless you want to clean up the poop everywhere nightmare of you life) when their poo is due and they can’t control it.
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Chewy and I get our life back 😉🥰
customer_reviews.text: My little 16 year old Yorkie has reached the incontinence stage .....unfortunately. For awhile I tried to catch him before an accident occurred and keeping him in the room I was always in. Then started trying different diapers to no avail. They just would not stay on. Then one day I recieved the order for your diapers. They were perfect! Chewy wears them all the time during the day (except when outside or playing in the pool with the grandkids) and THEY STAY ON and are lightweight. He again has free roam of the house because there are NO more accidents. Thank you so much for giving us our Happy worry free home back again! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: carolyn cross

customer_reviews.title: Not ultra absorbent
customer_reviews.text: The price on these diapers is great. However, they are not absorbent enough to last through the night without the diaper leaking badly. I switched from a more expensive brand but you get what you pay for. They work great if you change the diaper every few hours but 5+ hours and they will be leaking. Have to go back to my expensive brand for overnight diapers. I may consider purchasing this brand again as the daytime diaper when I am able to change more often.
customer_reviews.author: JAK in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Work very well !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Standard Poodle's first HEAT at 8 months. They do the job intended! No leakage ever even when she once urinated with it on, as I forgot to remove. It did not leak! Ordered the medium size but as she is growing so fast I needed to order a second larger size before the cycle is ended (3~4 weeks) ordered second set of medium Plus. I was really surprised that she tolerated wearing them. They are easy to put on and remove. I am satisfied with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cardio

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I am using size small for a 10 lb Silky Terrier (11 inch waist ) during her heat cycle. The diapers are easy to put on and adjust. The Silky is a long body dog and these have adequate coverage from her tail to the waist. The best part is her long hair doesn’t get stuck on the fasteners which retain their fastener quality so you can take the diaper on and off multiple times. My dog is very comfortable wearing these diapers and they stay on her. I am not certain about absorption or leakage because I take them off when she has to do her business outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Have elderly 5lb cat on Chemo for intestinal cancer who is incontinent of urine and feces. This gives me a break from having to clean up accidents. I check her skin often for redness or breakdown and wash like you would for a baby. Tail hole is in right the place. Check kitty so that they can move easily in hip area after applying. Grateful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: really helped my baby girl in her last months
customer_reviews.text: I lost my beautiful girl last night. One of the things that she experienced as of late was incontinence. I got these diapers for her and they fit her so well. She was 16 lbs and I had enough room to wrap them on her comfortably. zI had used the small before but these were much better size for her. They never leaked. The tail cut out was really helpful to "anchor" it on her comfortably and give her her dignity back. Recommend if your baby is having these issues too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. I did just recently buy these and have tried them several times. I ordered the xs for my aging weiner dog. He is under 10 lbs. These seem like a pretty good product. The diapers did fall off my dog a few times but that could be due to me putting on 2 diapers in case if he has to poop. I read in another review to put on 2 but the tail hole needs to be covered so no accidents happen. Only reason i gave 4 stars is because they fell off when using 2.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good but now leak
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's going on with these diapers as I've ordered them several times previously but now they seem to leak at least half the time. They're also not made so that a dog's 1st morning pee, which is usually the highest volume pee of the day, can be contained in this diaper. Additionally if you have a dog smaller than 9 lbs then these will probably be too big. Even the smallest size, the XS, is borderline being too big for my 8-9 lb shih tzu.
customer_reviews.author: VW BEETLE

customer_reviews.title: Best disposable dog diaper
customer_reviews.text: After trying several different brands we found this one that is absolutely perfect. For small dogs who may have an incontinence problem all the time or maybe just occasionally they work great. And if they haven’t done anything it’s easy to put back on and re-fasten. We have found others that are dogs didn’t like and that you could not re-fastened because they would fall off. Very satisfied and have ordered numerous times
customer_reviews.author: C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: These are among the best if not the best
customer_reviews.text: These are a godsend for a 16-year old Schnauzer with some occasional incomitance issues. She is on medication, but sometimes can't make it outside before having to wet especially after waking up. The only caution to users is to be sure to let your dog have some time with out a diaper on so they can clean themselves. Otherwise, you risk a urinary tract infection. Compared these to diapers from the pet store and the price and quality are superior.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Size Small too big for a Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. However, I should have gotten a size down. I used the size chart and other comments to determine the size, and they are way too big. I have a Yorkie who is on the bigger side (about 10 pounds), and she can literally walk right out of the size small. I will get the product again, but I will order her an XS next time. We use these diapers for incontinence, and they have done the job when I can get them to stay on due to the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Leala Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fit is Small
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality, thick dog diapers but even though my dog fit well within the measurements for size small, they barely fit on her. She is still under a year so she is a slender/athletic 20 pounds and they seem very small on her. Would purchase again but if you're in-between sizes or on the higher end of measurements for a size, size up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Colman

customer_reviews.title: Effective Dog Diapers
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found this brand of diaper that fits properly on our beagle. The diaper fits nicely when applied right, however, every once in a while our dog manages to find a way to wiggle herself free of it. Fortunately, I found the perfect onesie to pair with the diaper so that there's no escape. For anyone interested I would suggest the Surgi Snuggly that Amazon offers.
customer_reviews.author: SWBDBM

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but DOG MUST HAVE TAIL!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 9 year old Min Pin (9 lbs) with bladder issues, and a very competitive chihuahua (10 lbs) so every time there was an “accident” it would be 2. Our Min Pin has a docked tail (not by us) and these will NOT STAY ON without a tail! Don’t even bother unless you have a super docile dog that won’t care or try to wiggle out. They worked ok for the chihuahua. They absobed a good amount but somehow (still not sure how) there was still a pee spot in the morning. But it wasn’t as bad as it could have been.
customer_reviews.author: LittleHazey

customer_reviews.title: Never got peed on
customer_reviews.text: I had put this on my Yorkie at night for a couple of days. She had dribbled small amounts of urine on the bed. It stayed up but I can't say how it was when it got wet, she never went while wearing it. pulled tight enough it did stay up. Loved the velcro like tabs. It can be opened and closed many times. I only gave 4 stars because the hole for her tail was to high and I had to cut it. Other people on here had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Our girl is getting old and can't hold it like she used to, especially overnight. We started out using Simple Solution (SS) but eventually tried Paw Inspired (PI) since they included a couple more diapers and (previously) were a few $ less. Both brands fit her about the same, but as far as absorbency there is no comparison. The PI brand is a much thicker diaper and thus holds much more urine than SS. With the SS brand her diaper was leaking onto the floors in the mornings, but that has never happened with PI.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible designed diaper overall. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Although these diapers appear to have adequate absorbency padding, from the tail on top to the back are way toooo short and way toooo long underneath for it to stay put. No matter how tight I put it, it is off my dog as soon as she attempts to walk. Terrible designed diaper overall.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Stark-Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR EVERY DOG
customer_reviews.text: My female rescue still pees in the house although she is 8 years old and has a doggy door at her disposal. I tried these diapers after measuring correctly for the right size to order. They fit her but were bulky and she went ballistic trying to walk around in them. My other little dog proceeded to pull them off of Lily and it was quite a scene! All in all, they didn’t work for us but might for some other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: 100% absorbant, no leaks and her fur was totally dry.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel is in congestive heart failure and is being treated with a diuretic. The medication encourages her to drink a LOT and therefore urinate a LOT and frequently. These diapers hold what she puts out, no leaks and her fur is completely dry when the diaper comes off even after all night. They must be comfortable, she doesn't mind getting them put on and has never seemed bothered by them or tried to get them off. This is an awesome product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Whedon

customer_reviews.title: Buy These NOW!!
customer_reviews.text: These diapers have CHANGED OUR LIVES! We have a 17 year old mini - dachshund who simply can’t remember where she can and cannot potty. She weighs 9 pounds and we buy the XS. Fits perfectly! No leaks, no carpets or bedding to be cleaned. Please give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These dog diapers have made life much easier. My 16 year old dog has incontinent issues mainly during the night. Medications have not worked, so I reluctantly gave in to using diapers. I should have done it sooner and saved us both a lot of grief. My dog used to wake up with her bedding and fur drenched in urine. I would have to wash her and her bedding daily. Now she is dry, the diaper is very absorbant so it keeps her dry and I don't have to do laundry every day.
customer_reviews.author: jet

customer_reviews.title: Maggie's diaper quandary.
customer_reviews.text: I really like your product,but I have a question. Been buying from you for the last 2-3 months.i always order the same size. When I got my auto ship for the same product and same size,it seems like they fit a whole lot smaller than before.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good Girl Tracy🤗
customer_reviews.text: This product was a game-changer for me & my dig Tracy. She no longer is banished to the basement & always in trouble for something she, unfortunately, doesn't understand. Trust me, give this a try, so much better than pads that my dog, who is 13, didn't use. I can Invite Guests again. I can now invest in a new floor with the worry of putting Tracy down. Thank you so much! Ed
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs with any girth.
customer_reviews.text: These are remarkable nappies for dogs. Fit well, tabs hold tight, super absorbant. My senior beagle has an expanded waistline however, making it very easy for her to wriggle out of these as they barely close. I have to cut the tail opening a little longer too for a more accurate fit. If your dog is small to medium sized and does not have the expansive waistline they should work great!
customer_reviews.author: KJHall

customer_reviews.title: Worst Diapers EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst diapers I’ve ever used! The fit is ok but they leak urine out tail hole, sides and even the top part. I’ve tried every brand made because my rescue chocolate Lab was born without a bladder. The best diaper was actually Amazons but they no longer have them and the second best is Simple Solutions.
customer_reviews.author: debi main

customer_reviews.title: They’ll do
customer_reviews.text: I got these cause my dog I rescued was in heat. Liked the wet indicator, just wish it wasn’t plastic tabs but Velcro so I could re fit the diaper better without losing stick. Can’t really testify on absorbency and leak proof cause she didn’t really pee a lot in this, she tore them off too fast. Not sure comfort either since she hasn’t learned to speak English yet but she’s only a year old so... otherwise good diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan25

customer_reviews.title: Diaper stays put
customer_reviews.text: I had a 25lb beagle who wore medium. After running to the pet store to grab some diapers, after running out of these, I found that this brand stays in place so much better. The fit is snug enough that the diaper doesn't work its way off my dog as she moves around at night. They caught every drop of her incontinence. It brought sanity back into my life not having my house smell like urine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best diapers ever❤️
customer_reviews.text: Your product makes it possible for my 19-year-old dachshund to stay clean. I can keep her close without messes. She cries when she cannot be close to my husband and We want her to be happy and in comfort. Your product gives me confidence that I can keep her and our home clean. I attach the diaper to her collar with suspenders. Otherwise, they would fall off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Call

customer_reviews.title: Very decent diaper for an elderly dog.
customer_reviews.text: These are good diapers. My elderly dog just passed, but we used these on a nightly basis for a few years. We tried a ton of brands and these work the best, with the exception of the generic amazon ones which are no longer available in medium. Price is a bit high compared to the generic, but a way better value than the big box/pet store brands. Most other brands either fall off the dog, irritate her, or leak. These hold in overnight pee and only really come off the dog with the occasional poop accident. Since we used them for urinary incontinence, that limitation was fine for us. Comfort seemed good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Goodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Too bad this is not a MALE dog diaper
customer_reviews.text: I have a male dog and need to find a diaper for a male dog that collects the poop, not just the urine like the male dog wraps are designed for. I mean, doesn't anyone else have a problem with their male dog pooping in the house when they're not home?
customer_reviews.author: caraj

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: My 7 pound Yorkie is having "nighttime" issues so I ordered these. They are or seem to be well made but I think the sizing recommendations I read about are a little off. From what I read online, I ordered xsmall and really should have ordered small. These really don't fit her so am not comfortable using them at night. That's why I gave it a 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: The xsmall fits great on my 9lb you poodle
customer_reviews.text: The xsmall fits great on my 9lb you poodle. The small is a little big but also works. She rarely actually goes on them (they are for accidents) but if she does it does not leak. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Brookins

customer_reviews.title: Great option for incontinence!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my senior Pomeranian. She began to have trouble holding her urine and so these were great for the moments when she couldn’t make it until we got her outside. After a few uses, she didn’t seem to mind them at all. I would suggest bending and bunching them before you put one on your dog to make it more flexible. If there’s a lot of urine, these can leak... but that only happened every once and a while. She was also able to squeeze a poop or two right out of the tail hole. Ha ha... how I miss my buddy. 🐶😘
customer_reviews.author: Julee Steele

customer_reviews.title: These diapers have been making things easier for me and my senior dog.
customer_reviews.text: These diapers have been making things so much easier for us. My Boston Terrier is being treated for congestive heart failure and due to diuretics, pees in the hallway of my building before she can get outside. So we’ve been putting these diapers on her just before getting out of the apartment, she pees in them, and they absorb everything!! And I’m talking about a loooooooot of pee. The only thing with her though (she has no tail and has chunky proportions) is that the diapers will come off once she pees in them and sometimes slide off when she walks. But they work for what I want/need so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product... seriously
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, my 14 year old Bichon has dementia and now has to wear diapers. I've tried about seven different brands and this product is by far the best. They fit perfectly, the tabs stay securely in place even if you have to adjust them over and over, they're super absorbent, comfortable, and the price is affordable. Very happy customer. Both Boo and I say thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and value
customer_reviews.text: I love these diapers for our inherited Shih Tzu. They fit great! She weighs about 21 lbs and the medium are perfect! They easily can be taken off by my husband and I and will restick multiple times to reuse if not soiled. It has made a happy home for everyone! I don't think she was ever trained in her 5 yrs to go outside or on puppy pads. These are a very good value and price!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie is 19 years old and is in kidney failure. She has incontinence when she sleeps. I tried many different doggy diapers but this brand really works well for her. She weighs 6 lbs so I get the XS size. At first I thought they might be too small but after adjusting both sides a few times they fit nice and snug. There is a tail hole but most of the time her tail slips under it. The diapers are very absorbent. If she poops in it it sometimes escapes out the leg holes. I use cloth velcro diapers (found here on amazon) over the diaper for extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Alane

customer_reviews.title: Medium works for my 15 year old 20lb Boston Terrier
customer_reviews.text: I duct tape the tail opening shut from the inside of the diaper, and then I use this pacifier clip - Babygoal Pacifier Clips for Girls-3 Pack Pure Color Universal Pacifier Holder Fits All Pacifiers and Teething Toys, Baby Show Gift PS03 - which I thread through her harness and then clip to her diaper to stop it from falling off. The clip is a little long so I fold the cuff of her diaper over a little to shorten it and then clip it. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bobie

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is really between medium and small. Size smalls are too small for her but mediums are just a tad too big. Either way, the product does its job and is very durable. The only time I had an issue was when my dog peed so much it leaked through. But that was a fluke! It turns out she wasn't taken out in the morning so she had a lot to pee. Overall, it is worth it and I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good doggo diapers
customer_reviews.text: my 16 year old 9lb Tibetian Spaniel has been peeing everywhere in the apt, so I needed something ASAP. These work pretty well, I needed to order the Small instead of the XS. She doesnt love them but its saving my headaches and having to mop my hardwood floors three times a day. I recommend these if your dog is old and is being a jerk and peeing everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: You can’t return once you open it and the size of the diaper is still wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I have a year old miniature schnauzer, she’s about 12lbs & 12 inch waist. Fairly slender. After reading many reviews about the diapers being tad small, I ordered a size up. If my pup is laying down the diaper stays in place for a short amount of time, but eventually slides off. If she’s up and about within a minute the diaper slides right down. The absorption ( as far as I can tell) is pretty good, with no leakage. But as far as fit/“comfort”, it’s definitely disappointing. I can’t return the package even if I bought 32count, and I’m unsatisfied. Hence the two stars... and that’s being generous
customer_reviews.author: Jaxson Gian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy These Diapers Were Invented
customer_reviews.text: My dog is about 6-8 lbs and these diapers (size small) fit well! She doesn't love wearing them but the adhesive is good enough to prevent her from slipping out of the diapers about 80% of the time. The tail hole in the diaper also makes it really easy to slip her tail through, so it makes it really easy to put the diapers on her. We've never had a leakage problem with these diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Tuvin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small female dog
customer_reviews.text: We’re been buying these dog diapers for our senior dog for quite a while, they fit her perfect and it’s preventing accidents in the house. We are very satisfied with this product and will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Hole for Tail accommodates Large, Fluffy Tails
customer_reviews.text: Other products cut the circulation for fluffy, thick tails and I have to cut the hole bigger to make them work. Paw Inspired diapers fit all tails. I am a long time customer. My only disappointment is the large increase in price and decrease in the thickness of the padding. I have 2 dogs and these are a necessity and the price for 2 gets draining.
customer_reviews.author: gmw

customer_reviews.title: Some extras wanted
customer_reviews.text: Grateful this product exists. Quality lacking but does the job the best it could. Does not absorb all difference experiences. So moving allows out sides. My girl not fond of anything on her body ... the ones using now seem on tab tummy part disproportionate with open for tail. I had to buy cover ups with suspenders to keep them on her ... fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L Lundborg

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbency and easy removable restick tape.
customer_reviews.text: The diapers were easy to put on and secure i liked that the tape was easy to undo and retape. The tape would continue to stick after several times of removing the same diaper. Our dog has cushings and dementia so she has forgotten to go outside for the bathroom this diaper has caught both urine and feces as she is a small pitty 40 pounds. Has great absorbency if put on securely.
customer_reviews.author: Gchill

customer_reviews.title: Give more coverage to a dog bordering between small and ex small.
customer_reviews.text: These diapers were purchased for my 11 yr. old yorkie mix. I did Know these sort of product existed. The agency who urged the adoption did NOT tell me that she was deaf, blind, and most likely had been crated her entire life. Thus my need for female doggie diapers. I have tried several brands, but none of those allowed for repositioning the tabs once placed. But this brand does! Anyone who’s had to diaper a dog who wiggles throughout the process will appreciate this quality. They are soft to the touch and very absorbent. Measure your dog before selecting the appropriate size.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for my Yorkie; however, the absorption needs to improve and I have a dog bone to pick with these! I have had a monthly subscription for quite a while and every single package has issues with the adhesive strips. It's a problem in the manufacturing. They are still usable but one side has the strip stuck to the cotton part, not where it should be adhesed prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes, diapers are the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: We were very skeptical as to the use of DIAPERS ON OUR AGING DOG!! What a relief that these diapers are not the problem we thought they would be --taking off to go outside, putting a clean diaper on, especially in the middle of the night. They have definitely made it easier to keep the floors clean! They fit perfectly, our dog has adjusted to wearing them and we're happy with our decision to purchase these diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Works well for an incontinent elder dog
customer_reviews.text: I have an incontinent elder shih tzu that is 7-8 pounds. Both the small and extra small sizes work for her, the tape just needs to be overlapped a little more on the small size to get a tight enough fit that she can't "Houdini" her way out of them. These do absorb a lot of liquid, but be warned, they usually will not contain solid waste that can come out of the tail hole. They are a life saver for your rugs or carpets if you have a dog that "forgets" where she is supposed to go or just can't hold it for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: J Beach

product_meta.title: Paw Inspired 32ct Disposable Dog Diapers | Female Dog Diapers Ultra Protection Disposable Puppy Diapers Female | Diapers for Dogs in Heat, Period, Excitable Urination, or Incontinence
product_meta.description:
Size:SmallPaw Inspired Ultra Protection Disposable Dog Diapers are one of the highest quality Disposable Dog Diapers in the market. They are specially designed to keep your dog comfortable and your home protected. Unlike many other brands, these dog diapers are equipped with convenient repositionable fasteners make fitting your dog easy and painless. Paw Inspired Ultra Protection Disposable Dog Diapers are excellent for female dogs in season, incontinence, travel and excitable urination.

Features:
★Repositionable Fur Resistant Fasteners
★Super Absorbent Core
★ Leak Proof
★ Comfortable & Secure Fit
★Contains Advanced DrySpeed Technology that instantly converts urine into gel
★ Gathered Leak Proof Edges
★Breathable bottom layer

Many Uses: 
★ Females in Season
★ Incontinence
★ Travel
★ Excitable Urination

Please check the size chart for all sizing information. If you measure your pet properly and choose the corresponding size These diapers will fit many dog breeds including challenging body shapes like Dachshunds, Yorkies, Pugs, French Bulldogs, Bulldogs, Tailless Breeds, and any other Dog Diaper Houdini. If your dog is still a professional Dog Diaper Houdini you can check out our Paw Inspired Dog Diaper Suspenders which will assure your diapers stay on and stay put.
feature_bullets: Best Dog Diapers on the Market, Check the sizing chart to assure suitable sizing so Diapers Stay on and Stay Put
Leak Proof, Super Absorbent Core, Comfortable, and Secure Fit | Breathable Bottom layers and Gathered Leak Proof Edges
Repositionable Fur Resistant Fasteners | Advanced DrySpeed Technology that instantly Converts Urine into Gel

Many Uses and Applications: From Puppy, Adult, to Older Dogs these Dog diapers help with issues like training, incontinence, Period - Menstrual Hygiene. Also can be used as pet diapers for other pets (cat diapers)

Best for Female - Girl Dogs and urinary incontinence. These can also be used as Dog Diapers for poop, diarrhea, and bowel Incontinence, but effectiveness depends on the tailhole position of your dog. Please check product images for tailhole position for each diaper.
